channel.title: Authors on Jongse Park
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Jongse Park

item.description: I am an assistant professor in the School of Computing at KAIST and a faculty member of Computer Architecture and Systems Laboratory (CASys)! I am also affiliated with School of Electrical Engineering (SSE), Graduate School of AI, and Graduate School of AI semiconductor. I am very much looking forward to working with talented students on exciting projects. If you’re interested in joining my research group, please contact me via email introducing yourself (with your CV and transcripts if available).
